title: Big Cannabis Can Be Good Cannabis And Good Cannabis Can Be Big Business
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: With the world in lockdown, cannabis sales are surging in most states, but with massive unemployment, will that continue? Rena Sherbill talks to Jason White, CMO at Curaleaf, one of the biggest MSOs with $1 billion in annual sales in its sights. They cover the importance of knowing when to partner with an expert and when to expand a company's own offering, building brand synergy and how CURLF is innovating more products and strengthening its national footprint. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
